channel.title: How Do I Change Prices?
channel.description: How Do I Change Prices Of Items In A Store...? 317, delta

item.title: How Do I Change Prices?
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

[quote=“wanttobecoders, post:2, topic:368490”][size=12pt]Search on you’re Source

Config

Item.cfg

Search for you’re item ID[/size]

item = ITEMID    ITEMNAME    DESCRIPTION    BUYPRICE    SELLPRICE    ALCHPRICE

[size=12pt]example you want to change the buy price of dark bow 50k to 180m[/size]

item = 4827    Dark_bow    A_Dark_Bow.    50000    50000    50000    0    0    0    0    305    0    0    0    0    0    0    0

[size=12pt]So change the 50000 to 180000000[/size]

item = 4827    Dark_bow    A_Dark_Bow.    180000000    50000    50000    0    0    0    0    305    0    0    0    0    0    0    0

[size=12pt]
Dont take care about the rest of the number it’s the stat

hope i help you :)[/size][/quote]Thanks Alot For The Help Rep++ For You

Read full topic
